committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, to the Imperial Valley College Barker Museum of El Centro, California, specified lands near Ocotillo, California, for use as a museum. Reserves a right of reversion to the United States should such lands be used for other than public park, including museum, and recreational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.
